description: Detective investigations lets you investigate IAM users and IAM roles using indicators of compromise. An indicator of compromise (IOC) is an artifact observed in or on a network, system, or environment that can (with a high level of confidence) identify malicious activity or a security incident. ListInvestigations lists all active Detective investigations.

parameters.name: GraphArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the behavior graph.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Lists if there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Repeat the call using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token will return a Validation Exception error.

parameters.name: FilterCriteria
parameters.description: Filters the investigation results based on a criteria. Severity (dict) --- Filter the investigation results based on the severity. The string filter value. Status (dict) --- Filter the investigation results based on the status. State (dict) --- Filter the investigation results based on the state. EntityArn (dict) --- Filter the investigation results based on the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the entity. CreatedTime (dict) --- Filter the investigation results based on when the investigation was created. A timestamp representing the start of the time period from when data is filtered, including the start date. A timestamp representing the end date of the time period until when data is filtered, including the end date.

nested_params.name: Severity
nested_params.description: Filter the investigation results based on the severity.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: Filter the investigation results based on the status.

nested_params.name: State
nested_params.description: Filter the investigation results based on the state.

nested_params.name: EntityArn
nested_params.description: Filter the investigation results based on the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the entity.

nested_params.name: CreatedTime
nested_params.description: Filter the investigation results based on when the investigation was created.

nested_params.name: StartInclusive
nested_params.description: A timestamp representing the start of the time period from when data is filtered, including the start date.

nested_params.name: EndInclusive
nested_params.description: A timestamp representing the end date of the time period until when data is filtered, including the end date.

parameters.name: SortCriteria
parameters.description: Sorts the investigation results based on a criteria. Field (string) --- Represents the Field attribute to sort investigations. SortOrder (string) --- The order by which the sorted findings are displayed.

nested_params.name: Field
nested_params.description: Represents the Field attribute to sort investigations.

nested_params.name: SortOrder
nested_params.description: The order by which the sorted findings are displayed.

nested_items.name: InvestigationDetails
nested_items.description: Lists the summary of uncommon behavior or malicious activity which indicates a compromise.

nested_items.name: InvestigationId
nested_items.description: The investigation ID of the investigation report.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: Severity based on the likelihood and impact of the indicators of compromise discovered in the investigation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status based on the completion status of the investigation.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the investigation. An archived investigation indicates you have completed reviewing the investigation.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time stamp of the creation time of the investigation report. The value is an UTC ISO8601 formatted string. For example, 2021-08-18T16:35:56.284Z.

nested_items.name: EntityArn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM user and IAM role.

nested_items.name: EntityType
nested_items.description: Type of entity. For example, Amazon Web Services accounts, such as IAM user and role.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Lists if there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Repeat the call using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged.
